title: "MLB hopes AI facial recognition and sensor tech will enable hands-free entry to ballparks"
excerpt: "Major League Baseball ( MLB) is testing facial recognition technology that would allow fans with a ticket to enter any ballpark hands free. The ‘Go Ahead Entry’ system uses artificial intelligence (AI) enabled cameras to verify genuine ticketholders, meaning fans don’t have to physically scan a bar code on a paper ticket or on their smartphone."
